hello_message:
Hello! I'm your chatbot üòÄ 

To get started, press the button below or type a message. 

Please note that the information provided by AI may not be accurate and should be used for reference only.
choose_question:
Please choose your inquiry. 

To return to the start, type 'Start'.
answer_message:
I will answer about {content}. 
For additional inquiries, please enter your message. 
To return to the start, type '{start_button}'.
intro: Hello, I am Yunseo, a cross-platform developer.
projectA: Project A: Shopping App Development with Flutter
projectB: Project B: Machine Learning-Based Recommendation System

details.detail1: Improved app performance by identifying and fixing bugs, resulting in a 15% increase in app speed.
details.detail2: Contributed to the successful implementation of a new feature, leading to a 20% increase in user engagement.
details.detail3: Enhanced app stability by conducting thorough testing and resolving critical issues, reducing crashes by 25%.

details.detail1: Participated in research on machine learning algorithms.
details.detail2: Developed a mobile app as part of a senior project, which was awarded the best project in the class.
details.detail3: Completed coursework in data structures, algorithms, and software engineering with top grades.

projectA.title: Project A: Shopping App Development with Flutter
projectA.description: Developed a shopping app with a user-friendly UI. Key features include a shopping cart, order tracking, and user review system.
projectA.contribution: Contribution: Frontend and backend development, API integration

projectB.title: Project B: Machine Learning-based Recommendation System
projectB.description: Developed a system that provides personalized recommendations by analyzing user behavior. Conducted data analysis and model training.
projectB.contribution: Contribution: Data preprocessing, model training and evaluation, results analysis
